channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Has Your Gmail Password Been Hacked? Check Now, Here’s How
item.description: Hackers are coming for your Gmail password. Fact. But what if they already have it? Here’s what you need to do to find out.

item.title: Check Your iPhone Now—These Models Will No Longer Receive Updates
item.description: Apple has issued a new update warning, which means you need to check your iPhone now. Here's what you need to know.

item.title: Apple Reveals Winning Tree Designs That Will Shine On Battersea Power Station HQ
item.description: The holiday images on Apple’s London HQ are always spectacular, projected 330 feet tall on Battersea Power Station. Here’s what they’ll look like.
